    • Uses of Filter in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics

    • Uses of Filter in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter

      Classes in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter that implement Filter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdjustFilter
      A Filter which adjusts the percentage of all three RGB channels in the Sprite.
      class  AlphaFilter
      A Filter which adjusts the percentage of the alpha channel in the Sprite.
      class  BlurFilter
      A Filter which applies a simple 3x3 box blur to the Sprite.
      class  BrightnessFilter
      A Filter which applies a brightness effect to the Sprite.
      class  ColorMapFilter
      A Filter which replaces sequential shades of gray on the Sprite with the specified colors.
      class  ContrastFilter
      A Filter which changes the contrast of the Sprite.
      class  CyanotypeFilter
      A Filter which applies a cyanotype effect to the Sprite.
      class  GrayscaleFilter
      A Filter which applies a gray-scale effect to the Sprite.
      class  HueFilter
      A Filter which changes the hue of the Sprite.
      class  InvertFilter
      A Filter which inverts all three RGB channels in the Sprite.
      class  PosterizeFilter
      A Filter which applies a posterized effect to the Sprite.
      class  ReplaceFilter
      A Filter which replaces one set of colors in a Sprite with another set of colors.
      class  SaturationFilter
      A Filter which applies an desaturation or oversaturation effect to the Sprite.
      class  SepiaFilter
      A Filter which applies a sepia-tone effect to the Sprite.

    • Uses of Filter in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter.dynamic

      Classes in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter.dynamic that implement Filter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AcidFilter
      A dynamic Filter which applies a trippy, repetitive effect to the Sprite.
      class  ColorNoiseFilter
      A dynamic Filter which applies a colored noise to the Sprite.
      class  GrayNoiseFilter
      A dynamic Filter which applies a colorless noise to the Sprite.
      class  SineFilter
      A dynamic Filter which applies a vertically sinuous effect to the Sprite.
      class  SpectrumFilter
      A dynamic AdjustFilter whose values cycle through the rainbow.
